["DescriptionLUXHABITAT is pleased to present this modified, fully upgraded luxury 5 bedroom home in the popular Lime Tree Valley community in Jumeirah Golf Estates.
This breathtaking family home is truly a one-of-a-kind featuring large open living spaces, huge designer kitchen with top of the range appliances, 4 large ensuite bedrooms and an incredible master suite encompass the main living areas. In addition, the property boasts a rare and unique large multi-purpose basement and comes with good sized, externally accessed maid's and driver's rooms. The villa is ideally located in a private corner of the community and sits on a large fully landscaped plot offering tremendous views of the World Championship Earth Course and Lake. Viewing is highly recommended.
Lime Tree Valley is a neighbourhood of 121 luxury Spanish style villas all coming with great views of the World Championship Earth Course, Lakes and Landscaped areas.  
Jumeirah Golf Estates remains the sought after, luxury villa development in Dubai. With two Championship Golf Courses, state of the art practice/training facilities and world-class Country Club, Jumeirah Golf Estates is ideally located just minutes away from schools and popular landmarks including DIFC/Downtown Burj Khalifa, Dubai Mall, Mall of The Emirates, Dubai Marina, etc."]
